contents: Article 2 (Definition) The meanings of terms used in these regulations are as follows, and the names of each part follow the registration classification in Article 18 of the Player Registration Regulations. Revised 2016. 6. 16., 2022. 1. 24., 2023. 3. 23. 1. Comprehensive Sports Competition means the National Sports Competition, National Winter Sports Competition, and National Boys' Sports Competition hosted by the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council). It refers to sports competitions and national sports festivals. 2. National Sports Competition refers to a competition in which competitions are held for a set period of time at a certain location for the under-19s, college, and general divisions for the purpose of professional sports in some of the sports organizations that have joined the Sports Council as member sports organizations. 3. The National Winter Sports Festival is a competition held at a certain location for a period of time for the under-13s and under-16s for the purpose of fostering some of the sports groups that are members of the Sports Association, and for the under-19s, university and general divisions for the purpose of professional sports. This refers to a competition in which the game is played by setting a date. 4. National Boys' Sports Competition is a competition held for a certain period of time in the following year in the region where the National Sports Competition was held for under-13s and under-16s for the purpose of fostering some of the sports organizations that have joined the Sports Council as member sports organizations. Refers to a competition in which a game is played. 5. What is the National Sports Festival? It is an area that holds a national youth sports competition for the under-13s, under-16s, under-19s for the purpose of sports for all, university, and general classes for the purpose of fostering sports that have joined the Sports Association as a member sports organization. This refers to a competition that is held for a certain period of time in the following year.
